item.title: Aerial Drones | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: What is the Aerial Drone Competition? A cutting-edge program that prepares students for careers in drone technology Four exciting missions: Teamwork, Autonomous Flight, Piloting Skills, and Communications Compete in local, and regional events No prior experience needed! We're looking for students who are: Curious about drones and aviation Interested in coding and programming Excited to learn piloting skills Great at teamwork and communication Ready to take on new challenges Students are not required to participate in a Competition.

item.title: Drones 2-Day Winter Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join us for an exciting 2-day hands-on camp where you’ll learn how to fly CoDrone EDU drones while exploring the fundamentals of drone technology, coding, and problem-solving! This immersive experience is perfect for beginners and enthusiasts looking to dive into the world of drones, combining fun flying challenges with STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) education. Camp Details: Day 1: Getting Started with CoDrone EDU Introduction to Drones: Learn about drone technology, safety protocols, and the CoDrone EDU features.

item.title: First Lego League Challenge 2-Day Winter Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join us for an exciting 2-day immersive experience at the First Lego League Challenge Winter Camp! This hands-on camp is designed for young innovators, problem-solvers, and future engineers passionate about robotics, teamwork, and STEM. Participants will dive into the world of LEGO robotics, learn coding skills, and tackle real-world challenges of this year's First Lego League Challenge.

item.title: First Lego Challenge | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Prepare to take on the challenges of FIRST LEGO League like a pro! This course is designed to help students build a strong foundation in robotics and engineering, focusing on the key skills needed to design, build, and optimize a competition-ready robot. Students will: Master the fundamentals of building sturdy and efficient robots tailored for competition. Learn how to design and attach modular attachments that can be quickly changed to tackle a variety of missions.

item.title: First Lego League Explore | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Dive into an exciting new season of FIRST LEGO League with the 2024-2025 theme: SUBMERGED! This year’s challenge invites participants to explore the mysteries and wonders of underwater environments while solving real-world challenges related to oceans, lakes, and waterways. Participate in the official First Lego League Explore program Work on collaborative projects with peers Learn about real-world applications of robotics and engineering This class is perfect for budding engineers and curious minds ready to take their first steps into the world of robotics!

item.title: Lego Robots Jr | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This four-class sequence introduces the students to the world of robotics and coding. Students will construct Lego models that use motors and lights and create code to bring their creations to life. This class is suitable for students with no previous experience using Lego robots. Introducing the Next Generation of Coders! The Fundamentals of Coding with SPIKE Essential is the fun and engaging way to teach your elementary students essential STEM skills.

item.title: Vex Go Challenges | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: The VEX GO Competition is an exciting, team-based robotics challenge designed specifically for elementary students to explore STEM concepts in a fun and engaging way. Using the VEX GO building system, teams will design, build, and program their robots to complete a series of creative and hands-on missions. Participants will: Develop critical thinking and teamwork skills by solving real-world challenges. Learn the basics of engineering, robotics, and coding through guided activities.

item.title: Robotics with Lego Spike | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Jump into the world of robotics and coding with the LEGO Education SPIKE Prime system! This hands-on course introduces students to the exciting possibilities of robotics engineering and computational thinking through engaging, project-based learning. Designed for beginners to intermediate learners, this course will teach students how to design, build, and program robotic solutions to solve real-world challenges. In this course, students will: Learn the basics of robotics using the LEGO SPIKE Prime kit.
